name: ConversationDesignFlashcards
0:
”Alexa, open conversation design flashcards”
”Alexa, start conversation design flashcards”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conversation design flashcards
des:
Alexa can help you learn new topics or study for your test. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint, Google Bard and ChatGPT. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
